<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">c4895cc9836e5210cccd5d10feaad3fd</macroponent><name>list___simple_1/fixedQuery</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {

  var query = "";

  var allInactive = Object.values(api.state.Selected_State).every(state => state.active === false);

  if (allInactive){
    return '';

  }else{

    return api.state.Query;

  }

    


    

    
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-17 12:58:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>033529d1832ad210cccd5d10feaad362</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list___simple_1/fixedQuery</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automotive Service Management" source="x_1522458_automo_0">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automotive Service Management">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_033529d1832ad210cccd5d10feaad362</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-17 14:20:57</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
